Title: Relates to participation in a public group self-insurer
Summary: Defines a public group self-insurer for the payment of compensation to employees of county self-insurance plans, boards of cooperative educational services and consortia by boards of cooperative educational services; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd §119-o, Gen Muni L; amd §50, Work Comp L; amd §3443, Ins L; amd §30, Vol Ffs Ben L; amd §30, Vol Amb Wkr Ben L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, the workers' compensation law, the insurance law, the volunteer firefighters' benefit law, and the volunteer ambulance workers' benefit law, in relation to participation in a public group self-insurer
